title: Connect360 v3.36 w/patch + Gamertag OSX Widget
description:
Cliffnotes: Connect360 is a patched program that installs on your mac and works with your xbox 360 allowing the flow of media onto your 360 to view.

Late September 2008 release: v3.36

torrent includes:

-Readme
-Patch
-v3.36
-gamertag widget
-"sauce" files

What&#039;s new in V3.36?

* Fixes "Share only checked photos"
* Fixes playcount updates to be more accurate
* Added setting to limit the refresh interval for iTunes
* Fixes incompatibility with MediaLink, update MediaLink too
* Mac OS X 10.4 or later is now required

Supported Formats

* AAC, Apple Lossless, WMA
* MP3, WAV, AIFF
* H.264, DIVX, XVID
* MOV, AVI, WMV, ASF
* JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, BMP
* RAW

System Requirements

* Mac OS X 10.4 or later
* An Xbox 360 with a network connection
* iTunes for iTunes sharing (free download from Apple&#039;s site)
* iPhoto for iPhoto sharing (part of Apple&#039;s iLife suite)


Enjoy!
-Procrasturbate
